trans-unit.source: Represents an entry in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog" /> custom place collection for Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma entrada em uma coleção de local personalizado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog" /> para Windows Vista.

trans-unit.source: The default open and save dialog boxes on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] have an area on the left side of the dialog box titled **Favorite Links**.
trans-unit.target: O padrão abrir e salvar caixas de diálogo em [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] tem uma área no lado esquerdo da caixa de diálogo intitulada **Links Favoritos**.

trans-unit.source: This area is called custom places.
trans-unit.target: Essa área é denominada locais personalizados.

trans-unit.source: This class represents a custom place.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe representa um local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], essa classe não tem nenhum efeito.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que representa uma Pasta Conhecida [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace" /> class with a custom place identified by a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace" /> com o local personalizado identificado por um GUID de Pasta Conhecida [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] pastas conhecidas, consulte [GUIDs de pasta conhecidas para locais do arquivo de caixa de diálogo personalizada](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) ou o arquivo KnownFolders.h a [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace.%23ctor%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace.%23ctor%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole o seguinte código em um formulário do Windows e a chamada `InitializeDialogAndButton` do construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: A folder path to the custom place.
trans-unit.target: Um caminho de pasta para o local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace" />.

trans-unit.source: with a specified folder path to a custom place.
trans-unit.target: com um caminho de pasta especificada para um local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID for the custom place.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o GUID de Pasta Conhecida [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] para o local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that indicates the [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder for the custom place.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que indica o [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] pasta conhecida para o local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: If the custom place was specified with a folder path, then an empty GUID is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o local personalizado foi especificado um caminho de pasta, um GUID vazio será retornado.

trans-unit.source: For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] pastas conhecidas, consulte [GUIDs de pasta conhecidas para locais do arquivo de caixa de diálogo personalizada](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) ou o arquivo KnownFolders.h a [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the folder path to the custom place.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um caminho de pasta para o local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: A folder path to the custom place.
trans-unit.target: Um caminho de pasta para o local personalizado.

trans-unit.source: If the custom place was specified with a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder GUID, then an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o local personalizado foi especificado com um [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] conhecido GUID de pasta, em seguida, uma cadeia de caracteres vazia é retornada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa essa instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa essa instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace" />.
